summary: Mr Siika seagulls - a Beyond Skyrim resource converted for Skyrim from the Oblivion resource by Mr Siika
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://lh4.googleusercontent.com/-g4MUjm_1RAU/U1u0h-aZoPI/AAAAAAAAF9o/seYIy8x73xs/s128/BS%20-%20Resources.png[/img]

[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=========================
Mr. Siika Seagulls

Modder's Resource
=========================

By mr_siika

Converted by Tamira

=========================

This is a Beyond Skyrim resource converted for Skyrim from the Oblivion resource by Mr Siika.


You can find the original file here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/15648/?

=========================

There are five different seagulls, all animated. You can add them as statics or as activators to the game.
You will get a message when you add them in the CK which you can ignore, it does not matter. I have not found out how to get rid of it.
I have a sound included but you can of course add your own sound.

=========================
[youtube]f9W841TeaJM[/youtube]
The ship in the screenshots and in the video is made by Markus Liberty from the Beyond Skyrim team:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59426/?

Visit the Beyond Skyrim forums:
http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/
http://www.darkcreations.org/forums/forum/626-beyond-skyrim-projects/
They still look for talented modders who want to help with their projects

=========================
Tools Used:
=========================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the files for your own mods as long as you give credit and you do not charge money for it.
Please link back to this resource when you use it in your mod.

Do not upload to other sites.

mr_siika has been away from modding for quite some time, and will likely not return to the forums.
Deeza from the Beyond Skyrim team was originally granted permission to port the assets featured in this resource to Skyrim, he can prove the permission, which I have seen too.

=================
Credits:
=================

mr_siika for his resources and for everything he has given to the TES community
juskiddink for the sound: http://www.freesound.org/people/juskiddink/sounds/100724/
The Niftools team for giving us Nifskope.
Skyfox from the Niftools team for his great tool NifUtils
ttl269 from the Niftools team for his help finding a bug in one of the seagull nifs
The Beyond Skyrim Team
author: mr_siika and Tamira
